entry.name: tickLength
entry.label: The length of the time interval ('tick') used by the physics simulation.

entry.name: gravity
entry.label: The gravity pulling down on the ball.

entry.name: friction
entry.label: The friction slowing the ball down.

entry.name: restitution
entry.label: How much bounce the ball responds with when colliding with the desktop edges.

entry.name: playSound
entry.label: Whether to play a sound when colliding with a desktop edge.

entry.name: soundVolume
entry.label: The volume of the collision sound.

entry.name: maxConcurrentSounds
entry.label: The maximum number of collisions to sound at the same time.

entry.name: autoBounce
entry.label: Whether to automatically pull on the ball to make it bounce.

entry.name: autoBounceStrength
entry.label: How strongly to pull on the ball when auto-bouncing.

entry.name: showHelpTexts
entry.label: Whether to show help texts in the widget.
